Description:
Detects use of an encoded/obfuscated version of an IP address (hex, octal...) in an URL combined with a download command

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Obfuscated IP Download Activity
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%invoke-webrequest%' or command like '%iwr %' or command like '%wget %' or command like '%curl %' or command like '%downloadfile%' or command like '%downloadstring%') and ((command like '% 0x%' or command like '%//0x%' or command like '%.0x%' or command like '%.00x%') or (command like '%http://%%' and command like '%%2e%') or (command re 'https?://[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.0[0-9]{3,4}' and command re 'https?://[0-9]{1,3}\.0[0-9]{3,7}' and command re 'https?://0[0-9]{3,11}' and command re 'https?://(0[0-9]{1,11}\.){3}0[0-9]{1,11}' and command re 'https?://0[0-9]{1,11}' and command re ' [0-7]{7,13}')) and  not command re 'https?://((25[0-5]|(2[0-4]|1\d|[1-9])?\d)(\.|\b)){4}')
